column4: Wooheww, I got my DVD to play err... wait, it was playing and now it froze... and then closed. Arg!!!  Why is it so difficult for DVDs to play on Linux.
Hey Nick, would you mind answering a few questions that I have about why what I did just worked, and why what I tried before that did not in regards to DVD playing?
because of US law there isn't a way to play DVDs legally without using (buying) proprietary software
